description:
- Re-write Bass Line (98% Accurate)
- Fortissimos and forte fortissimos correct on notes
- Fixed some minor notes error, slides, missing notes
- Added the mute notes and the extra distortion in outro
- Fixed the quarter-note to eight-note in verse 2 and for the correct slide sound
- Volume changes
- Correct slides, timing and staccato on chorus
- Little Fixs in guitar track and fortissimos
- I tried to compact the bass lines because the Mark Boomer dont stop putting a wrong tab -_-

description: Add many correction on the bass part, specially in the beginning. Cliff Burton recorded 3 different parts ! The bass line is based on the transcription made by Andriy Vasylenko. I also modified the "bell" tone (in fact, it's an anvil). The song can also be played in D tuning, wich is the original tone when the band recorded it in the studio. Have fun ! Rock on \m/
title: For Whom The Bell Tolls
